ComicInfo.Summary:
The final issue of "The Fatal Englishman" story takes you places you never thought you would go. Four hardened soldiers must decide if it is better to eradicate all life in England than live another day with the overwhelming threat of the Crossed.
There is no hope. There is no cure. There is only the Crossed.
Available with a Regular and Torture cover by Jacen Burrows, Wraparound cover by Raulo Caceres, and a special Red Crossed Incentive also by Burrows.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/crossed-badlands-28-the-fatal-englishman-conclusio/4000-404709/
ComicInfo.Title: The Fatal Englishman Conclusion
